mapper.select: select register_id, register_patient_id, register_user_id, register_regdate, register_date, register_starttime, register_memo, register_communication, register_state from registers

select register_id, register_patient_id, register_user_id, register_regdate, register_date, register_starttime, register_memo, register_communication, register_state from registers where register_date={#register_date}
